mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `sys_role`(`name`, `role_value`, `description`, `status`, `create_time`, `modify_time`, `create_id`, `modify_id`, `del_flag`) VALUES ( #{role.name}, #{role.roleValue}, #{role.description}, #{role.status}, #{role.createTime}, #{role.modifyTime}, #{role.creatorId}, #{role.modifierId}, #{role.delFlag} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE modify_time = now() ;
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, role_value AS roleValue, description, status, del_flag AS delFlag FROM `sys_role` WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 0 AND del_flag = 0
